resources.string: It is my great pleasure to invite you to explore the Jashore University of Science and Technology (JUST) online through our website. Contribution of science and technology for developing a nation is well known to all. To meet up the diversified demand of people, information and communication technology and biological sciences are playing the key role. University is the most suitable place for education and research. Universities are playing a vital role in building efficient manpower for the ……Established in 2007, Jashore University of Science and Technology is a non-profit public higher education institution located in the the suburban setting of the large city of Jashore (population range of 1,000,000-5,000,000 inhabitants). Officially accredited and/or recognized by the University Grants Commission of Bangladesh, Jashore University of Science and Technology (JUST) is a very small (uniRank enrollment range: 500-999 students) coeducational higher education institution. \n \n Jashore University of Science and Technology (JUST) offers courses and programs leading to officially recognized higher education degrees such as pre-bach elor degrees (i.e. certificates, diplomas, associate or foundation degrees), bachelor degrees, master degrees, doctorate degrees in several areas of study. See the uniRank course levels and areas of studies matrix below for further details.
